content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT snappyparquet
WITH
(FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
)

COPY INTO [dbo].[COMPANY2]
FROM 'https://storagemeghashah.dfs.core.windows.net/test/Company_Incremental_2023-04-14T16_12_41.3430923Z (1) (1).parquet'
WITH (
FILE_FORMAT = [snappyparquet],
CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY='Managed Identity')
)

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Shahtest@123456';

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL msi_cred WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Service Identity';

SELECT CONVERT (varchar(256), SERVERPROPERTY('collation'));Â 

select LEN(description) from company where len(description)>8000;

SELECT column_name, data_Type, character_maximum_length
FROM information_Schema.columns
WHERE table_name='Company'

COL_LENGTH('Company','MANAGERS_NOTES')
